remarks: Orthogonality (meaning inner product is 0) is commutative.  Complex version of ~ iporthcom .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Oct-2015.)
statement:
cphipcj.h $e |- ., = ( .i ` W ) $.
cphipcj.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
cphorthcom $p |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ A e. V /\ B e. V ) -> ( ( A ., B ) = 0 <-> ( B ., A ) = 0 ) ) $.
